metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2442 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: The Qualcomm buspm driver in Android before 2016-05-01 on Nexus 5X, 6, and 6P devices allows attackers to gain privileges via a crafted application, aka internal bug 26494907.

criterions.comment: linux-flo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
